title: A RESOLUTION ACKNOWLEDGING THE DOST-FPRDI XYLARIUM WOOD COLLECTION AS A CULTURAL HERITAGE, SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY, AND TOURISM LANDMARK OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS, LAGUNA, SUPPORTING ITS DECLARATION AS A NATIONAL CULTURAL TREASURE, AND DIRECTING ITS INCLUSION IN THE OFFICIAL TOURISM PROMOTIONS OF THE MUNICIPALITY. Author Co-Authors
